long_description: Short and stout, but certainly no teapot, OnGuard Bulldog Mini U-lock provides sturdy locking security for your bike in a compact, easily transported design. Hefty 13mm (0.51 in.) hardened steel shackle resists cutting, prying and jacking; rubber-coated shackle and crossbar help protect your bike's finish. Dual lock down mechanism secures both sides of the shackle for excellent pull resistance. Bump-proof Z-Cylinder tumbler resists picking, pulling or drilling. Rounded design and centered keyhole eliminate pry points; extra-thick, molded end cap protects against bumps and hits. Comes with 5 laser-cut keys, 1 of which has an integrated LED light; mounting bracket Included. OnGuard rates the Bulldog Mini U-lock as a 63 out of 100 on its 100-point security rating system, where higher-rated locks offer increased security.
short_description: Short and stout, but certainly no teapot, OnGuard Bulldog Mini U-lock provides sturdy locking security for your bike in a compact, easily transported design.
